Notification No. 01/2021 – Integrated Tax
New Delhi, the 1st May, 2021
G.S.R.....(E).- In exercise of the powers conferred by section 20 of the Integrated Goods
and Services Tax Act, 2017 (13 of 2017), read with sub-section (1) of section 50 and
section 148 of the Central Goods and Services Tax Act, 2017 (12 of 2017), the

further amendment in notification of the Government of India in the Ministry of

(i) vide number G.S.R. 698(E), dated the 28th June, 2017, namely:–
